library(plotly) library("ggthemes") # Learn about API authentication here: /r/getting-started # Find your api_key here: /settings/api dsamp <- diamonds[sample(nrow(diamonds), 1000), ] tableau <- (qplot(carat, price, data = dsamp, colour = cut) + theme_igray() + scale_colour_tableau()) out <- py$ggplotly(tableau) plotly_url <- out$response$url
